product_name: The North Face Verbera Utility Snow Boots - Men's
long_description: These waterproof, cold-weather, leather utility boots (rated to -40F) offer PrimaLoft Silver recycled insulation and winter-specific, grippy outsoles for ultimate cold-weather comfort.
short_description: These waterproof, cold-weather, leather utility boots (rated to -40F) offer PrimaLoft Silver recycled insulation and winter-specific, grippy outsoles for ultimate cold-weather comfort.
